description: Public radio is accused of censoring an anti-government song that topped the charts.
title: Polish hit song on grieving 'censored', sparking protests
title_page: Polish hit song on grieving 'censored', sparking protests - BBC News
maintext: Cemeteries closed as a result of the events of recent weeks, recent events. I look at the chains, I wipe away my tear, just like you, just like you. The gate opens, I can't believe my eyes. Perhaps things are different after all. I run over, your heavies shout stop, because your pain is better than mine.
